definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Even the children had to knock on the door for permission to go to the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 就連孩子們也得敲他們的們才能獲得許可去廁所。

sentences.english: Low-flow toilets can save a lot of water.
sentences.chinese: 節水廁所可以節省很多水。

sentences.english: Cooking water is recaptured to flush toilets, for instance.
sentences.chinese: 比如，廚房用水可收集起來沖洗廁所。

sentences.english: At noon, Dorothy unlocked the rest-room door and discovered that he was gone.
sentences.chinese: 到了中午，託羅絲找開廁所的門，卻發現它不見了。

sentences.english: The utility model is suitable for the automatic flushing of a water flushing type toilet.
sentences.chinese: 它適用於水衝式廁所的自動沖水。

sentences.english: The john by the morning market is always dirty.
sentences.chinese: 早市旁邊的廁所總是不乾淨。

sentences.english: A graywater catchment system could collect reusable water for irrigation and toilet flushing.
sentences.chinese: 廢水回收系統可以用來灌溉，也可以用來沖廁所。

sentences.english: The powder room rest area, by contrast, is a very masculine decoration.
sentences.chinese: 而女廁所休息區則恰恰相反，是非常陽剛的裝修設計。

sentences.english: Today, I went into my bathroom and saw that my trashcan had been pushed over.
sentences.chinese: 今天我上廁所，發現垃圾桶翻了。

sentences.english: Because of the interview time has not yet arrived, wei wei into mans room in shoes.
sentences.chinese: 因面試時間還未到來，魏薇誤入男廁所換鞋。

sentences.english: Off of one room, there is a bathroom-sized space that people are lining up to see.
sentences.chinese: 人們正排隊等著參觀其中一個只有廁所大小的房間。

sentences.english: She sings Shadiness in the rest room if nothing?
sentences.chinese: 沒有她會在廁所裏面唱曖昧？

sentences.english: I've been up all night with it.
sentences.chinese: 我因此整天晚上起夜上廁所。

sentences.english: Have you seen our public toilets?
sentences.chinese: 你到過我們的公共廁所嗎？

sentences.english: A nearby toilet cleaner lady helped me pick up my book, and then gave me a big smile and wished me a good day.
sentences.chinese: 洗廁所的阿姨幫我拿書，很開心很大笑祝我過好天。

sentences.english: Thus, Tiago locked Cobolli in the washroom as a sort of revenge.
sentences.chinese: 因此，蒂亞戈把吉利鎖在廁所裏作爲對他的小報復。

definition: chamber pot/wooden pan used as toilet/toilet bowl
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
